traits.Archer's Eye (3/Day): As a bonus action, the archer can add 1d10 to its next attack or damage roll with a longbow or shortbow.

actions.Multiattack: The archer makes two attacks with its longbow.
actions.Shortsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.Longbow: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) piercing damage.
